official_title: Advancing New Modalities for the Detection of Oropharyngeal Cancer: Transcervical Ultrasound and HPV16 E6 Antibodies
inclusion_criteria:
* 21 years or older
* Suspected or confirmed oropharyngeal cancer
* Previously untreated cancer
* First cancer diagnosis
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* No to any of the inclusion criteria
* Under 21 years of age
* Inability to provide blood or oral rinse specimen
